post:
[NodeBlade Solutions, LLC](http://nodeblade.com) was founded at the start of December, 2015. We are a registered LLC in the state of Florida.

Have any questions? Contact us [here](https://my.nodeblade.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3).

Hello LET! Today we are celebrating the launch of our newest location: Dallas, TX. With the new launch, we have refreshed our home page and decided to double the RAM on all of our Dallas plans - just use coupon code **X2RAM** and allow us 24 hours to apply the upgrade!

**Did we mention that all servers come with free DDoS protection?**

Additional IPs: $1/mo. 

<hr>

 * 1 x vCPU
 * 30GB storage
 * 0.5TB transfer @ 1 Gbps
 * OpenVZ
 * $12/yr
